purpose: Facilitates the automation of software development tasks by leveraging AI and multi-agent systems.
principle: Builds on Amazon Bedrock for AI capabilities, using multi-agent orchestration to perform tasks such as file creation/editing, command execution, and web searching.
reusability: Designed for extensibility with customizable agents and APIs, supporting integration with existing development workflows.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited stability and feature completeness, primarily focused on AWS ecosystem.
name: bedrock-engineer
description: Autonomous software development agent apps using Amazon Bedrock, capable of customize to create/edit files, execute commands, search the web, use knowledge base, use multi-agents, generative images and more.
highlight: Autonomous software development using Amazon Bedrock with multi-agent capabilities and generative features.
